function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Labour shortages due to lockdown, furlough scheme, and workforce infections","Impact":"Reduced labor productivity, output, and project delays","Mitigation":"Implement flexible working arrangements, remote working, and workforce protection measures","Technologies":"Remote collaboration tools, workforce health monitoring technologies","People":"Employees, construction workers","Owner":"Construction companies, project managers"},{"Description":"Severe impact on cashflow, funding, and project costs","Impact":"Disruption of supply chain, inability to make payments, increased project costs, and confusion among builders and merchants","Mitigation":"Establish financial contingency plans, negotiate flexible payment terms, and prioritize essential project expenditures","Technologies":"Financial management software, project cost tracking tools","People":"Builders, merchants, clients, contractors","Owner":"Construction companies, project managers"},{"Description":"Potential for increased disputes due to force majeure provisions in contracts","Impact":"Legal disputes, project delays, and cost overruns","Mitigation":"Clarify force majeure clauses in contracts, maintain transparent communication, and seek legal counsel for contract interpretation","Technologies":"Contract management software, communication platforms","People":"Contractors, legal teams","Owner":"Construction companies, legal representatives"}]}
